Articles.Content:
Hey guys I've just posted episode 3 of my ksp series. you can find my channel here- http://www.youtube.com/user/NannerAirCraft?feature=mhee

And here are the 3 episodes
Also do you guys have any suggestions?
It is nice to see that you are posting these and are enthusiastic, but please try not to spam the discussion thread. If people have suggestions, they will bring them to you when they watch.
Sorry I'm not trying to spam. Also is there a better thread for this? On fan art that said they shouldn't be gameplay videos like these
I'm pretty sure vids have always been posted here, it's fine.

You could have edited your O.P. to ask for suggestions - no need to bump your own thread!

Also, can I suggest that if you have any more videos that you add them to the O.P. on this thread? If it drops off the second page then you are OK to bump the thread when and only when you post a new video - add a post at the end saying "O.P. updated with a new video".

That way, those people who are interested in your series will have one easy-to-use place to see them all, and you won't create a stream of threads that irritate those other people who aren't interested.
